mutants.original_line: im = [[255 - pixel for pixel in row] for row in im]  # Invert pixel values
mutants.mutated_line: im = [[255 + pixel for pixel in row] for row in im]

mutants.mutated_line: im = [[255 * pixel for pixel in row] for row in im]

mutants.mutated_line: im = [[254 - pixel for pixel in row] for row in im]

mutants.original_line: im = [[255 - pixel for pixel in row] for row in im]  # Invert pixel values

mutants.original_line: im = [[255 - pixel for pixel in row] for row in im]  # Invert pixel values
